description: This blog is an extension of the Mighty Minds Shiny App. Contains interactive charts and maps to explore the global prevalence of depression across different demographics from 1990-2019.
This app aims to explore the impact of COVID-19 on mental illness in the USA across different demographics using interactive charts, graphs, and maps.
This project trains various machine learning models from scikit-learn using my personal League of Legends solo queue statistics to classify games as a win or a loss.
